Talk_30:
<sp:3:0:2:0101>Thank you! That was a big help.


<sp:3:0:2:0700>Now then...<sp:5:1:0>I think I'll take a little break
before heading to my next job.
Talk_20:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:TalkPositive_01>That's right.<sp:5:0:0> It's definitely rough.<sp:5:1:0> Can I
tell you about it?
Talk_31:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:TalkPositive_00>Thank you!<sp:5:0:0> That really helped me out.<sp:5:1:0>
Now, I think I'll squeeze in a break, just
for a while.
Talk_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Think_00>Sorry.<sp:5:1:0> Everything around here is a bit of
a mess.
Talk_32:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy_01>Oooh!<sp:5:1:0> I was right!<sp:5:0:0> Using the terminal
did open the door.
Talk_33:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>How did you get in there?<sp:5:0:0> I was pretty
sure you couldn't get that door open
without using the terminal...
Talk_23:
<sp:3:0:2:0501><snd:Sad_01>I hope I can get back to the construction
company soon.<sp:5:1:0> I miss everyone.
Talk_04:
<sp:3:0:2:0901><snd:Angry_01>A <clr:0000>big chunk of old ruins fell from the sky<clr:ffff><sp:5:0:0>
and hit the Skyview Tower!
0007: If it's not a long story.
Talk_15:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseS_01>Huh?!<sp:5:1:0> We met at another Skyview Tower,
didn't we?

<sp:3:0:2:0501>I dashed here as fast as I could,<sp:5:0:0> and it
looks like you're pretty fast too!

<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Think_00>Did you come to see the Skyview Tower?
<sp:5:1:0>I hate to say it, <sp:5:0:0>but things are a bit of a
mess right now.
Talk_05:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Sad_01>It knocked off the lid that covers the
hole at the top of the tower.<sp:5:0:0>
Talk_25:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Happy_01>I recently took a job as a carpenter for a
company called Hudson Construction.<sp:5:0:0>

At first, things were great. Everyone was
really nice, <sp:5:0:0>and my boss taught me the
basics and everything.
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Think_00>But the day Hyrule Castle floated up,<sp:5:0:0> all
sorts of things changed.

Work started rolling in. It was endless!<sp:5:0:0>
We've been busy ever since.<sp:5:0:0>

<sp:3:0:2:0301>They sent us new carpenters to check
the Skyview Towers in each region. But
there are only THREE of us doing that.
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Sad_00>*sigh* <sp:5:1:0>This work is going to keep us out
in the field—away from our company—for
a LONG time...
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:LaughS_01><sp:0:2:2:5000>I mean, <sp:5:0:0>good to keep the towers running.<sp:5:1:0> That's
something at least.

<sp:3:0:2:0401><sp:0:2:2:6400>Ugh.<sp:5:0:0> Look at me. Got away from
myself there.

<sp:3:0:2:0001>That's not like me at all.<sp:5:0:0>


<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:TalkPositive_01><sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:0:2:2:6400>Hey, mister. <sp:5:0:0>I guess it was a whole,
long thing in the end.<sp:5:0:0> Sorry.<sp:5:0:0> Thanks
for hearing me out.
Talk_28:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01>That means the <clr:0000>hole at the top is open<clr:ffff>.<sp:5:1:0>
And that's not all! <sp:5:0:0>After the impact, the
door got stuck too.
Talk_18: <sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Sad>The door is broken<sp:5:0:0> and won't open...
Talk_08:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Ease>Phew! I finally can take a breather!<sp:5:1:0>
The construction company's short on
staff, which is a pain.
Talk_19:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Think>Let's see...<sp:5:1:0> Maybe if you used the
terminal inside,<sp:5:0:0> that would force the
door back open.
<sp:3:0:2:0a01>But without a way to get inside, we're
kind of stuck.
Talk_29:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>A lot of ruins have fallen around this area.<sp:5:0:0>
Really dangerous.

<sp:3:0:2:0701>Always a good idea to keep your eye on
the sky here, just in case <clr:0000>ruins plop <clr:ffff>right
down around you.
